sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-card>
        <el-row :gutter="20" class="top">
            <el-button type="primary" :icon="DocumentAdd" @click="handleAddDialog()">组卷</el-button>
        </el-row>
        <el-table :data="tableData" stripe style="width: 100%">
            <el-table-column prop="id" label="ID" width="80" />
            <el-table-column prop="name" label="问卷名" width="250" />
            <el-table-column prop="surveyQuestionIds" label="题目ID" width="250" />
            <el-table-column prop="action" label="操作">
                <template v-slot="scope">
                    <el-button type="primary" :icon="Edit"
                               @click="handleEditDialog(scope.row.id)">
                    </el-button>
                    <el-button type="primary" :icon="Edit"
                               :disabled="scope.row.surveyCateId === 1 ? false : true"
                               @click="handleEditItemsDialog(scope.row.id)">
                        编辑选项
                    </el-button>
                    <el-button type="danger" :icon="Delete"
                               @click="handleDelete(scope.row.id)">
                    </el-button>
                </template>
            </el-table-column>
        </el-table>
    </el-card>
</template>

<script setup>
import {Delete, DocumentAdd, Edit} from "@element-plus/icons-vue";
import {ref} from "vue";
import axios from "@/util/axios";

const tableData = ref([]);
const initList = async () => {
    const res = await axios.get('/api/survey-question/all');
    tableData.value = res.data.data.surveyQuestions;
}
initList();
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
